resources.string: Please enter your WiFi network credentials.
Please enter your device IP address
You can find your device IP address on the back of the cover
Błąd! Upewnij się, że jesteś podpięty do sieci WI-FI urządzenia, i sprawdź ponownie adres IP
Warning! This device works only with 2.4GHz WiFi networks.
Your device has not been yet configured. You can configure your device by clickling the button below or start brewing without it.
Add new brewing step by clicking on "+" button
